column4: I don know which control panel I have to choose for my server.
because they cause problems, and if you're running a server, you should know how to run it
so why do you need a control panel ?
a lot of control panels have problems with ubuntu due to how some of the file system applications are laid out
i'm thinking of ISPConfig, Froxlor, OpenPanel or VirtualMin
try them see what you like and see what they break
then you shouldn't be doing it
if you don't know which OS to use to run your hosting, you shouldn't be running hosting
when you decide which one you want, you can move forward
I have a python script on my website, but it just outputs the script on my website instead of running it
you need apache setup to "execute" python, otherwise it just treats it as a text file and displays it
you'll have to check the apache http documentation on using mod_python (I think it's called) or using python as a cgi script
he means it has strict rules on content, check the /topic when you join
